title: I feel like thats racist
body: well i was playing tahm kench and was wondering why i can w everyone but lucian?????? can youz fix it?

replies.body: I think you're also forgetting that Lucian's ult is LITERALLY a drive-by xD
Please elaborate on how TK can not devour Lucian (I'd thought it just eats everything), what happens, is that a bug or intended?
idk what to say to that but i tried to eat my friend lucian to save him but couldnt do it all game sooo yeah ????

> [{quoted}](name=Korean Zedsuuo,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=9Y9GuJre,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-05-21T02:37:58.837+0000)
>
> idk what to say to that but i tried to eat my friend lucian to save him but couldnt do it all game sooo yeah ????

Maybe a new bug of some sort because there is never a specific interaction between TK and Luc. If anything, the only thing I'm aware of is the supposed "TK drive-by" where Luc uses ulti and TK "drives" Luc around after devouring him.

If indeed a real bug and not some one-off due to random unknown reasons and is only exclusive to that match, then yeah, Riot needs to fix.

Lucian doesn't like frogs
